searchDocs.title: Ingredients​
searchDocs.content: 2 oz vodka1 oz simple syrup1 oz freshly squeezed lemon juice (typically 1/2-1 lemon)ice for shaking1 lemon slice for rimming the glass/garnishsugar for rimming the glass

searchDocs.title: Instructions​
searchDocs.content: Rim the glass by rubbing the lemon slice on the edge of the glass and moving it around in a bowl of sugarCombine the liquids in a shakerAdd ice to shaker and shake for 20-30 secondsStrain into the glass, straining out ice as desired

searchDocs.title: Margarita
searchDocs.content: Margarita Servings -+ Ingredients 1.5 oz silver tequila 1 oz orange liqueur (Cointreu, Triple Sec, or Marnier)0.75 oz lime juice (freshly squeezed)0.5 oz simple syrup (or to taste)1 cup ice 1 ct lime wedge (for rimming the glass/garnish if desired)1 oz course salt/sugar (for rimmming the glass if desired) Instructions Rub line wedge around cup rimPut cup rim in coarse salt/sugarCombine silver tequila (1.5 oz), orange liqueur (1 oz), lime juice (0.75 oz), simple syrup (0.5 oz) into shakerFill shaker with iceShake for 20-30 secondsPour into cup while straining out ice (can leave some ice if desired)Enjoy! Resources Recipe inspired by: https://www.gimmesomeoven.com/margarita-recipe/
